name: visualizer
description: üêã A Visualizer for Docker Swarm using the Docker Engine API and Node.JS.

scripts.docker-publish-dev: npm run build && docker build . -f Dockerfile -t yandeu/visualizer:dev && docker push yandeu/visualizer:dev
scripts.build: rimraf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.browser.json && tsc -p tsconfig.node.json && node scripts/copy-files.mjs
scripts.dev:manager: cross-env VISUALIZER_TASK=true VISUALIZER_TASK_AUTOSCALE=true VISUALIZER_TASK_AUTOUPDATE=true nodemon --watch dist --delay 800ms dist/manager.js
scripts.dev:agent: cross-env VISUALIZER_TASK=true VISUALIZER_TASK_AUTOSCALE=true VISUALIZER_TASK_SUBNET=true nodemon --watch dist --delay 1200ms dist/agent.js
scripts.save: git add . && git commit -m "quick save" && git push
scripts.registry: docker service create --name registry --publish published=5000,target=5000 registry:2

author: Yannick Deubel (https://github.com/yandeu)
